CustomField.formula: SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Core_Url__c)), IF(RIGHT(Core_Url__c, 1) == "/", MID(Core_Url__c , 0, LEN(Core_Url__c) - 1), Core_Url__c), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(normed_url__c)), IF(RIGHT(normed_url__c, 1) == "/", MID(normed_url__c , 0, LEN(normed_url__c) - 1), normed_url__c), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(url__c)), IF(RIGHT(url__c, 1) == "/", MID(url__c , 0, LEN(url__c) - 1), url__c), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Name)), IF(RIGHT(Name, 1) == "/", MID(Name , 0, LEN(Name) - 1), Name), "" ) ) ) ), "https://", "") , "http://", "") , "www.", "")
CustomField.label: Matching_URL
